msg: Added categories to portlet registry elements

author: taylor
msg: Start of a new rewriter framework. Still to be integrated with WebPagePortlet configuration parameters.
Once thats done I will deprecate the util/HTMLRewriterl.java class.
1. pluggable back end parsers, so that we are not tied to the Swing parser.
If someone wants to plug in an XHTML parser or XML
2. you can get events and extend the basic rewriter to decouple any business logic from the core functionality
- generateNewUrl -- called when you need to generate a new url
